languages.text: {n}От ярости и предвкушения на губах Каллигоса выступает пена, а глаза наливаются кровью. Издав утробный рык, он вопит:{/n} "Кровь трону Вольного Торговца! Черепа владыкам Простора!"
{n}Calligos' mouth foams with rage and anticipation, and his eyes become bloodshot. He emits a guttural scream:{/n} "Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Skulls for the lords of the Expanse!"
languages.original_text: {n}От ярости и предвкушения на губах Каллигоса выступает пена, а глаза наливаются кровью. Издав утробный рык, он вопит:{/n} "Кровь трону Вольного Торговца! Черепа владыкам Простора!"

languages.text: {n}Calligos echa espumarajos de rabia y expectación; tiene los ojos inyectados en sangre. Profiere un alarido gutural:{/n} «¡Sangre para el trono del Comerciante Independiente! ¡Cráneos para los señores de la Extensión!».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos' mouth foams with rage and anticipation, and his eyes become bloodshot. He emits a guttural scream:{/n} "Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Skulls for the lords of the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos echa espumarajos de rabia y expectación; tiene los ojos inyectados en sangre. Profiere un alarido gutural:{/n} «¡Sangre para el trono del Comerciante Independiente! ¡Cráneos para los señores de la Extensión!».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯的嘴角泛着白沫，充满了愤怒与期待。他的眼里布满了血丝，喉间发出一声狂啸。{/n}“血祭行商浪人王座！颅献扩区之主！”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos' mouth foams with rage and anticipation, and his eyes become bloodshot. He emits a guttural scream:{/n} "Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Skulls for the lords of the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯的嘴唇泛着白沫，充满了愤怒与期待。他的眼里布满了血丝，喉间发出一声狂啸。{/n}“血祭行商浪人王座！颅献扩区之主！”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Les yeux injectés de sang, Calligos écume de rage et d'impatience, puis pousse un cri guttural.{/n} « Du sang pour le trône du libre-marchand ! Des crânes pour les seigneurs des Étendues ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos' mouth foams with rage and anticipation, and his eyes become bloodshot. He emits a guttural scream:{/n} "Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Skulls for the lords of the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux injectés de sang, Calligos écume de rage et d'impatience, puis pousse un cri guttural.{/n} « Du sang pour le trône du libre-marchand ! Des crânes pour les seigneurs des Étendues ! »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}カリゴスの口が怒りと期待で泡立ち、目が充血し、叫び声を上げる。{/n}「ローグトレーダーの玉座に血を！エクスパンスの王に髑髏を！」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos' mouth foams with rage and anticipation, and his eyes become bloodshot. He emits a guttural scream:{/n} "Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Skulls for the lords of the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスの唇が怒りと期待で泡立ち、目が充血し、叫び声を上げる。{/n}「ローグトレーダーの玉座に血を！エクスパンスの王に髑髏を！」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Calligos' Mund schäumt vor Wut und Erwartung, und seine Augen sind blutunterlaufen. Er stößt einen kehligen Schrei aus:{/n} "Blut für den Thron des Freihändlers! Schädel für den Lord der Ausdehnung!"
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos' mouth foams with rage and anticipation, and his eyes become bloodshot. He emits a guttural scream:{/n} "Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Skulls for the lords of the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos' Lippen schäumen vor Wut und Erwartung, und seine Augen sind blutunterlaufen. Er stößt einen kehligen Schrei aus:{/n} "Blut für den Thron des Freihändlers! Schädel für den Lord der Ausdehnung!"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Öfkeyle dolan ve olacakları kestiren Calligos'un ağzından köpükler saçılıyor. Gözleriyse kan çanağına dönmüş. Gırtlaktan gelen bir sesle haykırıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir'in tahtı için kan! Enginlik lordları için kafatası!"
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos' mouth foams with rage and anticipation, and his eyes become bloodshot. He emits a guttural scream:{/n} "Blood for the Rogue Trader's throne! Skulls for the lords of the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Öfkeyle dolan ve olacakları kestiren Calligos'un ağzından köpükler saçılıyor. Gözleriyse kan çanağına dönmüş. Gırtlaktan gelen bir sesle haykırıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir'in tahtı için kan! Enginlik lordları için kafatasları!"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale
